content: row 9 k9 w&t row 12 p12 w&t row 9 k9 w&t row 10 p10 w&t row 13 k13 w&t row 10 p10 w&t row 11 k11 w&t row 14 p15 turn row 11 k11 w&t row 12 p12 w&t next round with c2 k to end row 12 p12 w&t row 13 k13 w&t row 13 k13 w&t row 14 p14 w&t foot row 14 p14 w&t next round k to end continue working in the round next round k to end rnds 1-10 with c2 k to end foot round 11 with c1 k to end foot making sure to pick up the wraps move on to directions for toe making sure to pick up the wraps on the first stitch of the next on the first stitch of the next round continue working in the round continue working in the round round rnds 1-2 with c3 k to end rnds 1-2 with c2 k to end rnds 3-4 with c1 k to end rnds 3-4 with c3 k to end repeat rnds 1-4 once more then rnds 5-6 with c1 k to end rnds 1-3 repeat rnds 1-5 move on to directions for toe move on to directions for toe copyright 2019 emily kintigh all rights reserved page 2 of 3 toe continue working with c1 only round 1 ssk k12 k2tog twice 28 sts round 2 k to end round 3 ssk k10 k2tog twice 24 sts round 4 k to end round 5 ssk k8 k2tog twice 20 sts round 6 k to end round 7 ssk k6 k2tog twice 16 sts round 8 ssk k4 k2tog twice 12 sts round 9 ssk k2 k2tog twice 8 sts round 10 ssk k2tog twice 4 sts cut yarn and pull through remaining sts loop co 3 sts work in i-cord for 4 bobble all sts finishing attach loop to cuff weave in ends wash and block abbreviations bobble- bind off co- cast on dpn s - double point needle s k- knit k2tog- knit 2 together p- purl pm- place marker round s - round s ssk- slip slip knit st s - stitch es w&t- wrap and turn copyright 2019 emily kintigh all rights reserved page 3 of 3
